title: Elmer's All Purpose Glue Sticks, Washable, 22 Grams, 12 Count
description: The Elmer's all-purpose glue sticks is everyone's favorite for easy, no-mess, permanent bonding. Perfect for paper projects, the craft glue It works on a variety of paper types including cardboard, foam board, display board and computer paper. The non-toxic glue goes on smooth and dries fast, clear and colorless for perfect projects every time. These Elmer’s glue sticks are also acid free, photo safe and non-toxic. Trust Elmer’s glue, the #1 teacher brand.
